HTML Minify Tool

Free Online HTML Minifier - Reduce File Size and Improve Performance

Free online tool to minify HTML code. Quickly reduce the size of your HTML files by removing unnecessary spaces, line breaks, comments, and redundant attributes to improve website loading speed and performance.

How to use the HTML Minifier

  1. Paste or type your HTML code in the input box.
  2. Click the Copy Result button to copy the minified HTML.
  3. Use the Clear button to reset the fields.
